educations.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
content: Courses: Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Database Systems, Deep Learning, Human Computer Interactions, Computer Vision

educations.school: Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology
content: Courses: Data Structures, OOP, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Artificial Intelligence, Web Development

description: Developed a Training Information System using Django and React.js and built robust ETL pipelines to streamline CTA Bus Maintenance operations, increasing planning efficiency by 80% and expanding user accessibility.

Designed and maintained ETL pipelines with Python, SQL, and Pandas to process 30+ years of historical data, boosting data accuracy by 80% and reducing processing time by 80% while cutting manual validation efforts by 70%

Optimized PostgreSQL databases managing 100,000+ training records and created interactive dashboards using Plotly and Power BI, improving query performance by 50% and enhancing data-driven decision-making with over 50% improved resource allocation.
Managed video production, editing, and equipment setup for university events and projects.
Created engaging content for university social media channels.
Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces using React.js, HTML5, and CSS3, resulting in a 31% increase in user satisfaction and a 12% boost in audience engagement.
Developed and optimized object-oriented code in Node.js, ensuring 100% compliance with industry and company standards, which improved code maintainability and scalability by 25%.
